item.title: Leni Riefenstahl made movies for Hitler. A new documentary digs through her archives
item.description: Adolf Hitler commissioned filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl to make propaganda about Nazi Germany. She lived to be 101 years old and denied knowing about the...

item.title: Shooting attack at Jerusalem bus stop kills at least 5
item.description: Paramedics said at least five people were killed in a shooting attack in Jerusalem after two attackers opened fire at a bus stop at a busy intersectio...

item.title: The U.S. is a major importer of Indian products made from Russian oil
item.description: The United States imports oil products from India's Reliance Industries refinery, which sources nearly half its oil from Russia.

item.title: How brightly colored do we want our food? For brands, it's a hill to dye on
item.description: Sam's Club is among the food makers removing artificial dyes from products, yet hoping shoppers don't notice a difference in color. But why?

item.title: 20 years ago, New Orleans fired its teachers. It's been rebuilding ever since
item.description: When New Orleans schools reopened after Katrina, most of the city's educators didn't get their jobs back. Instead, they were often replaced with young...
